projects.name: Machao store
projects.description: Identified and executed improvements for processes, content, and lead generation. Collaborated with Design Team to get high fidelity designs and posts and redesigned the onboarding flow, which met the user acquisition target of the company. Identified feed issues, formulated a redesigned model, resulting in a significant boost in user engagement. Actually, Its a self done startup currently running with my Team.
